MS MCQs

    Work with Liquid template language in Power Apps portals

    »

    1. What template language is integrated into Power Apps portals?

      Solid

      Liquid

      HTML

      JavaScript


    2. What do you need to do to apply entity permissions when accessing Microsoft Dataverse data in Liquid templates?

      Use the secure Liquid filter.

      Nothing, entity permissions are applied automatically.

      Select the Enable Entity Permissions option on the Web Template entity that contains Liquid code.

      Place Liquid code on a secured webpage.


    3. Where is Liquid code not processed?

      Page content

      Content snippets

      Web templates

      Web roles


    4. What would be the output of the following Liquid fragment if the user is signed in?

      Full name of the signed in portal user

      Empty string

      System Administrator

      This code will generate an error
